name: LUSAKA MUSEUM AR TOUR
description:
This app is the beta of an Augmented Reality tour app for the Lusaka National Museum.

If you are not at the Lusaka Museum you can still experience the app by getting all the target markers from https://bit.ly/2Scg01O

Please Report any bugs to https://goo.gl/forms/p1RgdItEQIOsOA2r1

Thanks for the support. :)
